title: Semantic Analysis: Validate default parameter expressions
description: Add validation for default expressions: (1) trailing defaults rule enforcement, (2) prevent self-referential defaults, (3) verify defaults can only reference globals and prior parameters, (4) type compatibility checks.
close_reason: Implemented and tested. Default expressions are now validated to only reference globals and prior parameters.

title: ObjFunction: Extend structure for default parameters
description: Add min_arity field and defaults: Vec<Option<Value>> field to ObjFunction struct. Update function object creation and display logic.
close_reason: Implemented and tested. ObjFunction now has min_arity and defaults fields.

title: AST and Parser: Add default parameter syntax support
description: Modify AST to represent parameters as Vec<(String, Option<Expr>)> and update parser to handle 'param = expr' syntax. Implement trailing defaults validation (once a param has default, all subsequent must have defaults).
close_reason: Implemented and tested. AST and parser now support default parameter syntax.

title: Code Generation: Evaluate defaults at function definition
description: Modify function compilation to evaluate default expressions and store resulting Values in ObjFunction. Set min_arity and arity fields correctly.

title: Integration Tests: Default parameter scenarios
description: Write integration tests covering: (1) basic defaults usage, (2) partial override, (3) full override, (4) trailing defaults validation errors, (5) complex default expressions, (6) edge cases (0 args, all defaults, etc.)

title: VM: Handle variable arity in function calls
description: Modify call_function() to: (1) validate arg_count >= min_arity && arg_count <= arity, (2) push default values for missing arguments from function.defaults array, (3) proceed with normal call frame setup.
